item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, September 14, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:

27. Defend against vampires with 10 gbps network encryption (228 points | 68 comments)
28. OpenAI, Anthropic, Google employees support California AI bill (3 points | 1 comment)
29. Don't ask if AI can make art – ask how AI can be art (3 points | 1 comment)
30. CrowdStrike ex-employees: 'Quality control was not part of our process' (501 points | 253 comments)
